document_data.mainbody:
agels were a type of bread roll from Greenfields in the Western Heartlands.
Bagels were round bread rolls, distinguished by a round hole in the middle. This bread had a chewy texture and was served sprinkled with sesame or poppy seeds.
A local specialty, bagels were served at the Waukeens Rest inn, a prominent layover spot between Elturel and Baldurs Gate.
